description: Microsoft Cinemania 97 is an interactive movie guide which has all the latest information about movies and the people involved in making them. There are 20,000 cross-referenced titles with reviews from sources such as 'Leonard Maltin's film and video guide' and biographies of actors, producers directors as well as celebrity guided tours on a range of subjects from Alfred Hitchcok to famous actresses. To use the Apple Macintosh version you will need the following: Multimedia PC with a 486/33MHz processor or higher. Microsoft Windows 95 or Windows NT Workstation operating system 3.1 or later. 8MB of memory for Windows 95, 16MB for Windows NT. 256 colour or higher resolution monitor. Hard disk space not needed to run from CD-ROM but 11MB for best performance.
